info.name: IntelliQ
info.description: IntelliQ is a web application that is created by 4th-year students of the department of Electrical And Computer Engineering, NTUA, Athens. This application is used for the creation, submission and management of smart questionnaires. A questionnaire is considered smart when the next provided question depends on the answer of the previous one. In this documentation, the provided services of the REST API are explained so that the user can send requests with the appropriate parameters.

item.name: Login & Logout

request.description: Endpoint to signup a user.
Endpoint to logout a user.

header.value: jwt=loggedout; Path=/; Expires=Tue, 07 Feb 2023 10:21:39 GMT; HttpOnly; Secure; SameSite=None

request.description: Endpoint to login a user.

item.description: Endpoints for signup, login and logout.

item.name: Admin Endpoints

formdata.description: Json file describing the questionnaire to be uploaded

request.description: Endpoint to create a questionnaire. Admin provides the questionnaire as a json file.

formdata.description: Json file describing the questionnaire to be uploaded

request.description: Endpoint to reset all the answers of a certain questionnaire, based on it's ID. This endpoint is accessible only to the creartor of the given questionnaire.

item.description: Endpoint for creation of a questionnaire and deletion of it's answers. Only accessible to users with role admin.

item.name: Use case Endpoints

request.description: Endpoint that returns an object that contains general information and the questions of a certain questionnaire. The questions are sorted by their ID. This endpoint is accessible only to the creator of the questionnaire.

response.name: Get Questionnaire

request.description: Returns an object that contains all the information of a certain question belonging to a certain questionnaire. The options of the question are sorted by their ID. This endpoint is accessible only by the creator of the questionnaire.

Endpoint that submits the option that was given on a question of a certain questionnaire on a certain answer session of the questionnaire. This endpoint is accessible only by the user who answers this session. Note that if a question type is profile, then there must be a request body with key "answertext" and value the desired answer. If the question's type is question, then the "answertext" value must be the empty string.

Endpoint that returns an object with the answers that were given to all the questions of a certain questionnaire during a certain answer session. The answers are sorted by the ID of the question. This endpoint is accessible only to the admin that has created the given questionnaire.

Endpoint that returns an object with all the answers that were given in a certain question, during all answer sessions of a certain questionnaire. The answers are sorted by the time they were submitted. This endpoint is accessible only to the admin that has created the given questionnaire.

item.description: Endpoints that provide services to users and admins.

item.name: General Use
Questionnaire-returning Endpoints

request.description: Endpoint that returns all the questionnaires created by the logged in admin. This endpoint is accessible only to users with role admin.

response.name: Get Admin's Created Questionnaires

request.description: Endpoint that returns all the questionnaires answered by the logged in user. This endpoint is accessible only to users with role user.

response.name: Get User's Answered Questionnaires

request.description: Endpoint that returns all the questionnaires that are not answered by the logged in user. This endpoint is accessible only to users with role user.

response.name: Get User's Not Answered Questionnaires

request.description: Endpoint that deletes a certain questionnaire and all it's related data (questions, options, sessions and answers). This endpoint is accessible only to the admin that has created the given questionnaire.

item.description: Endpoints that return or delete questionnaires.

item.name: Session-returning Endpoints

request.description: Endpoint that returns all the sessions of a certain questionnaire. This endpoint is accessible only to the admin that has cretted the igven questionnaire.
Endpoint that returns all the session IDs currently stored in the database. This endpoint is accessible only to users with role user.
Endpoint that returns the session submitted by the logged-in user. This endpoint is accessible only to users with role user.

item.description: Endpoints that return information about sessions.
Endpoints that are being used for general purposes such as the interaction with the application's frontend.

item.name: Super Admin Endpoints

request.description: Endpoint that confirms the connection of the server with the database.
Endpoint that resets all the data stored in the database.
Endpoint that creates a new user with the given role, username and password.
Endpoint that returns an object with information about a certain user.
Endpoint that deletes a certain user.
Endpoint to import data in the database.
Endpoint to delete data from the database.

item.description: Endpoints that are accessible only to the system administrator and are used for technical purposes.
